sentences.en: Buying a house can be a very tiresome business.
sentences.cn: 买房子会是件很麻烦的事。

sentences.en: Deliver me from such tiresome people.
sentences.cn: 让我离开这些讨厌的人们吧.

sentences.en: He was tiresome in contending for the value of his own labors.
sentences.cn: 他老为他自己劳动的价值而争强斗胜,令人生厌.

sentences.en: Her incessant complaining is tiresome to everyone.
sentences.cn: 她没完没了的抱怨使每个人都厌烦.

sentences.en: His doubts and hesitations were tiresome.
sentences.cn: 他的疑惑和犹豫令人厌烦.

sentences.en: How tiresome! I have left my watch behind.
sentences.cn: 真讨厌! 我忘了带表了.

sentences.en: It was tiresome and unfair and her brother was sick of it.
sentences.cn: 这真叫人腻味,而且也不公平,她哥哥对此可是厌烦了.

sentences.en: It would be too tiresome to wait in the queue.
Nobody likes to attend the tiresome lecture.
sentences.cn: 谁也不愿意上那个令人生倦的课.

sentences.en: Nothing is more tiresome than a superannuated pedagogue.
sentences.cn: 老朽无能的学究最令人讨厌不过。

sentences.en: Of course the ancients too are often very tiresome.
sentences.cn: 当然,老派人往往也无聊得要命.

sentences.en: She can be a very tiresome child at times.
sentences.cn: 她这孩子有时会很烦人的.

sentences.en: She lingered, and resisted my persuasions to departure a tiresome while.
sentences.cn: 她踌躇不去, 我好说歹说地劝她走,她就是不听.

sentences.en: The children were being rather tiresome.
the whole tiresome business of filling out the forms
These tiresome creatures eat holes in the leaves.
sentences.cn: 这些讨厌的虫子在叶子上咬出了洞。

words.tran_cn: 累人的；麻烦的；无聊的；引起疲劳的
疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
厌倦；使劳累（tire的ing形式）；感到疲倦
恼怒的,气愤的,令人讨厌的,发愁的

trans.tran_en: making you feel annoyed or impatient
